SEARCH
Package com.axelor.utils.rest

Interface UtilsRestService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UtilsRestServiceImpl
public interface UtilsRestService
Service interface for utility operations related to MetaModels. Provides methods for retrieving models and their references.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addReferences(com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel model, List<com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel> listOfRef, String... types)
    Recursively adds references of the specified types to the provided list.
    com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel
    getModel(String fullName)
    Gets a MetaModel by its full class name.

  • Method Details

    • addReferences

      void addReferences(com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel model, List<com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel> listOfRef, String... types)
      Recursively adds references of the specified types to the provided list. This method traverses the model's properties and adds any referenced models that match the specified relationship types.
      Parameters:
      model - the MetaModel to find references for
      listOfRef - the list to add references to
      types - the relationship types to include (e.g., "ONE_TO_ONE", "ONE_TO_MANY")

    • getModel

      com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel getModel(String fullName)
      Gets a MetaModel by its full class name. Extracts the simple class name from the full name and looks up the corresponding MetaModel.
      Parameters:
      fullName - the full class name (e.g., "com.axelor.meta.db.MetaModel")
      Returns:
      the corresponding MetaModel, or null if not found
